name: Restriction
text:
Loans provided for by this chapter shall be authorized only if these loans cannot be made by two lenders, which may include any of the following:



	(1)	Private lenders;
	(2)	Members of the farm credit system; or
	(3)	The United States Department of Agriculture; provided that the board of agriculture may waive this requirement for emergency loans. [L 1961, c 104, §2; Supp, §102-3.5; HRS ; am L 1979, c 222, §3; am L 1990, c 259, §1; am L 1997, c 258, §1; am L 1999, c 32, §2]
